definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Vivian, wife of the fallen hero Killoren. You must meet my lieutenant. Step.
sentences.chinese: 薇薇安，逝去英雄之妻，你必须见见我的中尉。

sentences.english: I can't endure thinking the world of you-only and me-absent.
sentences.chinese: 因为我不能想象一个你独存而我逝去的世界。

sentences.english: To sacrifice moments in your life now for those that are dead and gone is a wasteful endeavor.
sentences.chinese: 为了已经逝去的过往牺牲生命中当下的时间是徒劳的。

sentences.english: That which passe will be dear.
sentences.chinese: 而那逝去的将变的美好。

sentences.english: We've suffered an agonising seven years which has ruined the lives and health of my family.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经经受了家人生命和健康逝去的痛苦的七年。

sentences.english: The Day of the Dead is an ancient festival celebrated in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 鬼节是墨西哥人纪念逝去亲人的古老节日。

sentences.english: In begone days , I love you and you are.
sentences.chinese: 在逝去的日子里，我们彼此相爱。

sentences.english: There was a time, long ago, when Ewoks would war among each other.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人互相征战的时代逝去已久。

sentences.english: Youth fades into in the wind.
I think there will be cherry lonely empty after passing our courage to face the Society.
sentences.chinese: 我想寂寞也会有樱空逝去后我们该学会的勇敢去面对。

sentences.english: Walk on the streets, the fallen petal flutters lost time not to recover.
sentences.chinese: 走在落花纷飞的街道，逝去的时光无法再挽回。

sentences.english: Love looks like water passing east, foolishly poured in vain.
sentences.chinese: 情像水向东逝去，痴心枉倾注。

sentences.english: Let love dies, don't die with it.
sentences.chinese: 让爱逝去，但不要与之相随。

sentences.english: The ancient mansion spoke to me of by gone days.
sentences.chinese: 古老的宅第对我诉说逝去的岁月年华。

sentences.english: One generation passeth away, and another generation cometh, but the earth abideth forever.
sentences.chinese: 一代人逝去一代人来，但是大地常在永不衰。

sentences.english: It saddens me that my lifelong enjoyment and enthusiasm for medicine has all but died.
sentences.chinese: 我很伤心我对医疗事业终身的热爱已经逝去了。

definition: to fade into the distance/(fig.) to peter out/to fade away
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)
